attributes.action: ensure all british citizens of crimes overseas have the police services of this country at their diposal at all times. Not all countries have the resources or knowlegde the the British police and intelliegence services that we have in this country.  This should be available to any British citizen anywhere in the world at any time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Foreign countries should not try and deter or stop the full weight of British police services helping or co-ordinating efforts to solve crime or miscarriages of justice.
